# The Buckingham (Indianapolis, Indiana)

| locmapin = USA Indianapolis#Indiana#USA
| built =
| architect = Rubush & Hunter
| architecture = Bungalow/craftsman, Tudor Revival
| added = November 27, 1992

The Buckingham is a historic apartment building located at Indianapolis, Indiana. It was built in 1909â€“1910, and is a three-story, U-shaped, Tudor Revival style brown-red brick building with limestone trim.  It features four-sided turrets framing the three-bay entrance facade with loggia and oriel windows.
It was listed on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places in 1992.
See also
*National Register of Historic Places listings in Center Township, Marion County, Indiana
